lyric.verse: Dare mo minaide Jayama wo shinaide Hatri kiride Mitsumeatte Ana wa sukoshii Watashi ni Soshite wasurete Moo inai
lyric.chorus: Anata wo Shitte shimatta Wagamama na kono te Kikiwake no naiyube Anata wo sagashite iru
lyric.verse: TABLE no shita Yatara samayoo Furueru ashi Chuu wo matte Kazoeta fuyu wa Katate tsubushite Todoi takoro ni Kiete iku
lyric.chorus: Anata wo Shitte shimatta Wagamama na kono te Kikiwake no naiyube Anata wo sagashite iru Moo ichido dake Watashi no chikaku de itte Nee sasayaite Muda ni sasayaite Yamenaide Anata wa Oboeteru? Watashi ni fureta hi wo Itzura ni masaguru te ga Subete wo tokashita no
